title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP][L_RweI汉化]Fire-Extinguisher 灭火器|再也不怕熊孩子烧家了!!
author: 1234lian
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1234lian 于 2014-12-15 16:59 编辑 

原文

Fire Extinguisher Mod 1.7.10/1.7.2/1.5.2Compatible with Minecraft: 1.7.10, 1.7.2, 1.5.2 | Author: burnner_ | 21,375 views | 3 


This mod provides automatic fire extinguishers, as well as fire fighting foam. When the fire extinguishers detect fire, they release a large cloud of foam. The foam settles, and continues to fight fire.
Screenshots:
(http://www.9minecraft.net) Click this bar to view the full image.

(http://www.9minecraft.net) Click this bar to view the full image.
Mod Showcase:
Recipes:
How to install:Download and install Minecraft Forge.Download and install Grim3212 CoreDownload the mod.Go to %appdata%.Go to .minecraft/mods folder.Drag and drop the downloaded jar (zip) file into it.If one does not exist you can create one.Enjoy the mod.
Download Links:For 1.5.2
http://www.dl3.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1412948488
For 1.7.2
http://www.dl4.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1412921036
For 1.7.10
http://www.dl4.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1412921049
http://www.dl3.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1412948514





===========================================


简介


这个Mod的添加了灭火器。
它需要Grim3212模组来支持启动。
Grim3212模组添加了使用说明书。
用于让玩家知道Grim3212的mod如何使用...
而灭火器呢，顾名思义，帮助你快速灭火！
对着火或岩浆狠狠地右键吧！！
（一下就够了）

===================================

视频

本人喜欢搬运籽岷介绍的模组，不用自己去录视频了A.A
想直接看介绍请跳转至02:16~
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XODA3NDgzMDQ0.html?firsttime=136


===================================


汉化截图































=========================================

[redstone_dust]下载地址[redstone_dust]

汉化有点渣，机翻的，而且mod原来的翻译是岩浆会变成黑曜石= =
但是截图当中可以看见是直接消失了。。
注意：这只能消除火方块与岩浆，不能扑灭生物身上的火。灭火器要和Grim3212mod一起运行才可以！

毕竟都搬运+汉化了
评分下，你懂的

http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bnm1PVL
